mapper.select: select r_no, r_content, DATE_FORMAT(r_regdate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS r_regdate, b_no,id,name,seq from reply where b_no=#{b_no} order by r_regdate desc
mapper.insert: insert into reply (r_content,r_regdate,b_no,id,name,seq) select #{r_content},now(),#{b_no},id,name,seq from user where seq=#{seq}
